author: Ben Eisen
title: Stock Indexes Poised to Close Above Key Technical Level - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: A Tuesday stock market rally is putting major indexes on track to close above a key technical level, signaling theyâ€™re regaining momentum after a rough stretch this year. The S&P 500 climbed 1% by late morning on Tuesday, bringing its week-to-date gain to 1.9%.
